dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Found in streams.  Collected near the surface (Ref. 27228).  Feeds on worms, crustaceans, insects and plant matter (Ref. 7020).
